pages.text: $(thing)Crucial$() comes with a few new keyboard shortcuts for your pleasure. This entry will list their uses so you can take full advantage.$(br2)As always, these can be changed in the Controls menu.

$(li)$(bold)Change Hotbar$()$(br)Pressing $(item)$(k:quark.keybind.changeHotbar)$() will expand your hotbar to display your entire inventory. From there press one of the numbers to swap the two rows.$(li)$(bold)Lock Orientation$()$(br)Pressing $(item)$(k:quark.keybind.lockBuilding)$() will lock your rotation and block half. Any blocks you place after this will be rotated the same way you were when you locked it. Just press $(item)$(k:quark.keybind.lockBuilding)$() again to reset it.$(li)$(bold)Toggle Autojump$()$(br)Pressing $(item)$(k:quark.keybind.toggleAutojump)$() will toggle your auto jump on and off.
